trans-unit.source: Groups other <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"></xref> flow content elements.
trans-unit.target: 分组其他<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"></xref>流内容元素。

trans-unit.source: Span is used to group other inline flow content elements together.
trans-unit.target: 范围用于其他内联流内容元素分组在一起。

trans-unit.source: No inherent rendering is applied to content or other elements within a Span element.
trans-unit.target: 没有固有呈现不适用于内容或 Span 元素中的其他元素。

trans-unit.source: Span enforces a strong content model for child content.
trans-unit.target: 跨度强制实施子内容的强内容模型。

trans-unit.source: Child elements contained in a Span element must be derived from <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Inline>.
trans-unit.target: 必须从<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Inline>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Inline>派生 Span 元素中包含的子元素

trans-unit.source: Valid child elements include: - <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Bold> - <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure> - <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Floater> - <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink> - <xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer> - <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Italic> - <xref:System.Windows.Documents.LineBreak> - <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Run> - Span - <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Underline>
trans-unit.target: Valid child elements include: - <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Bold> - <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure> - <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Floater> - <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink> - <xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer> - <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Italic> - <xref:System.Windows.Documents.LineBreak> - <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Run> - Span - <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Underline></xref:System.Windows.Documents.Underline></xref:System.Windows.Documents.Run></xref:System.Windows.Documents.LineBreak></xref:System.Windows.Documents.Italic></xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer></xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink></xref:System.Windows.Documents.Floater></xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure></xref:System.Windows.Documents.Bold>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new, empty instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Span"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化一个新的空实例<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Span"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Span"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"></xref> object as the initial contents.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Span"></xref>使用指定的类<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"></xref>对象作为初始的内容。

trans-unit.source: The initial contents of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Span"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 新的初始内容<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Span"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Span"></xref> class, taking a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"></xref> object as the initial contents of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Span"></xref>, and a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> that specifies an insertion position for the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Span"></xref>类，将指定<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"></xref>对象作为新的初始内容<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Span"> </xref>，和一个<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"> </xref> ，指定的新的插入位置<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"></xref>元素。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"></xref> object that specifies the initial contents of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Span"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"> </xref>对象，它指定新的初始内容<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Span"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This parameter may be null, in which case no <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"></xref> is inserted.
trans-unit.target: 此参数可以为 null，在这种情况下不<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"></xref>插入。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> that specifies the position at which to insert the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Span"></xref> element after it is created, or null for no automatic insertion.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"> </xref> ，它指定要插入的位置<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Span"></xref>元素，它在创建后或以表示不自动插入 null。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Span"></xref> class, taking two <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> objects that indicate the beginning and end of a selection of content that the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Span"></xref> will contain.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Span"></xref>类，使用两个<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref>对象，以指示的开头和结尾的选择内容的内容，新<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Span"></xref>将包含。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is intended to initialize a new <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Span> element such that it encloses a selection of pre-existing content.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数用于初始化新<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Span>其包围的预先存在的选择内容的元素。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Span>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> that indicates the beginning of a selection of content that the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Span"></xref> will contain.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"> </xref> ，该值指示内容的选择内容的开头的新<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Span"></xref>将包含。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> that indicates the end of a selection of content that the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Span"></xref> will contain.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"> </xref> ，该值指示选定内容的末尾，新<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Span"></xref>将包含。

trans-unit.source: Raised when start or end is null.
trans-unit.target: Raised when start or end is null.

trans-unit.source: Raised when start and end do not resolve to a range of content suitable for enclosure by a element; for example, if start and end indicate positions in different paragraphs.
trans-unit.target: 时引发 start 和 end 不能解析为广泛的一内容适用于通过机箱元素; 例如，如果 start 和 end 指示不同段落中的位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection"></xref> containing the top-level <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"></xref> elements that comprise the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Span"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection"></xref>包含顶级<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"></xref>所包含的内容的元素<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Span"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection> returned by this property to enumerate or manipulate the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Span> element.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection>此属性来枚举或操作的内容返回<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Span>元素。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Span> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection"></xref> containing the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"></xref> elements that comprise the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Span"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection"> </xref>包含<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"></xref>所包含的内容的元素<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Span"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 此属性没有任何默认值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the content of a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Span"></xref> element should be serialized during serialization of a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Run"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示是否的内容<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Span"></xref>应序列化期间序列化元素<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Run"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Span.Inlines%2A> property does not have a simple default value.
trans-unit.target: 这`ShouldSerialize`提供方法，因为<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Span.Inlines%2A>属性不具有简单的默认值。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Span.Inlines%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value.
trans-unit.target: 此方法指示属性是否已从其默认值。

trans-unit.source: You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer for the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Span> or developing your own control incorporating the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Span>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你也正在开发的设计器<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Span>或开发你自己控制合并<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Span>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Span></xref:System.Windows.Documents.Span>通常调用此方法

trans-unit.source: A serialization service manager object for this object.
trans-unit.target: 此对象的序列化服务管理器对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the content should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果应序列化内容;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: manager is null.
trans-unit.target: manager为 null。
